objects.description: Once a persona has been developed an adversary will use it to create connections to targets of interest. These connections may be direct or may include trying to connect through others. (Citation: NEWSCASTER2014) (Citation: BlackHatRobinSage)

external_references.description: Mike Lennon. (2014, May 29). Iranian Hackers Targeted US Officials in Elaborate Social Media Attack Operation. Retrieved March 1, 2017.
Thomas Ryan. (2010). “Getting In Bed with Robin Sage.”. Retrieved March 6, 2017.

objects.name: Friend/Follow/Connect to targets of interest
objects.x_mitre_detectable_by_common_defenses_ex: Unless there is some threat intelligence reporting, these users are hard to differentiate.
objects.x_mitre_difficulty_for_adversary_explana: The nature of social media is such that the adversary naturally connects to a target of interest without suspicion, given the purpose of the platform is to promote connections between individuals.  Performing activities like typical users, but with specific intent in mind.
